#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Get Started with development =

==Step 1 Install JDK and eclipse==
Both JDK 6.0 and 7.0 is OK.

==Step 2 Install Android SDK API 4(Android 1.6)==
You can follow the installation guides in site [http://developer.android.com/sdk/index.html].

==Step 3 Sync project code from SVN==
1. Create a work space for development *%workspace%*;

2. Sync *Core* code with SVN path [https://family-accounting.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/proj/CoreLibrary/] into local work space *%workspace%/CoreLibrary*;

3. Sync *Android* code with SVN path [https://family-accounting.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/proj/Android/] into local work space `%workspace%/Android`;
